website_summaries.verdict: This more affordable Omega watch is built with the usual quality standard.
pros: Simpler design with a blue dial and date display
Sleek and simple Omega watch is a good size for anyone
Automatic movement and stainless steel bracelet
cons: Some customers noted a weak luminescent dial
Automatic movement means this watch must be worn frequently to run, but it has a 48-hour power reserve

customer_reviews.title: I like this model
customer_reviews.text: I like this model. It was love at first sight. It is a beautiful watch. I was debating myself between the black and the blue version. I dress casual with khakis and mostly blue stripped shirts so I picked the blue one. No regrets on that. I really prefer this model over a Rolex submariner. I’m a Bond fan, what else have to say. The anti reflective sapphire is awesome. I bought like 8 NATO straps. I love to change them according to the situation. I bought the watch 2 months ago and I’m still in love.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barrios Arias

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch; it came with an original box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch; it came with an original box. Delivered in two days with free local express delivery. Much nicer than I have expected. Recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: pastor915

customer_reviews.title: Superb watch, excellent experience.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, high quality, Swiss watch with an unparalleled reputation. It is beautiful and exquisitely crafted. Watchmaxx processed the transaction professionally, packed the watch carefully, and delivered it within their projection. I am at an APO address, so I was concerned about potential theft in transit and various potential shipping delays. None of that happened. I took it to a local German Omega retailer and they sized the band for a small fee - they were kind and professional. I’m very happy with all aspects of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nadel

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, quick shipping and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant watch, perfect size for any wrist. I have a smaller wrist and unlike many other watches in the same category it still looks great. Upscale without being too flashy or tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Arkady Itkin

customer_reviews.title: great everyday wear and sophisticated enough to wear
customer_reviews.text: Not to bold, just a simple quality sports time piece, great everyday wear and sophisticated enough to wear anytime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch as a wedding gift, and it is a really beautiful watch to behold. I was split between the blue and black dial, and am so happy that I went with the blue. The seller was very responsive to messages and always replied quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I must say, this watch is just spectacular. It’s a timepiece that can conform to any attire, whether it’s business casual, formal, or just out on the beach. If you’re looking to get into luxury timepieces, I would recommend this watch! I have a Rolex Sub Date and can tell you that I haven’t glanced at it since I got this Omega.
customer_reviews.author: Jordani Lima

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this watch, it is as described on your website, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel D.

customer_reviews.title: Best price by far on Amazon !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, and lots of history on this James Bond watch. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Edward M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch easy to setup And fast shipping I love this watch
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, came with all factory goodies, well packaged, wood box is sweet. cons-2 day shipping stretched to 6 days. Beautiful watch, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every detail about this watch was beautifully crafted. This watch can be appreciated by watch ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb watch! Omega is far above so many and it's clearly seen and felt in the quality of their time pieces. Every detail about this watch was beautifully crafted. This watch can be appreciated by watch enthusiasts as well as those who are simply looking or a world class watch. Amazing purchase! Definitely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best watch ever! It is everything it is advertised as!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: Nothing's perfect, but..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch, saved a grand plus on price. But beware your giving up 2 years off the warranty of buying in store. Watch received as promised, beautiful. But for those few who get a lemon, it could get tricky getting the necessary free repairs... so my question to you is..... are you feeling lucky.....?
customer_reviews.author: D. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch. I've had this watch for 8 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Watch. I've had this watch for 8 months now, and it is amazing.If you don't plan on wearing it every day, you need to buy a watch winder.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Watch, genuine and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: It's a sweet heart, all of the detailing is a phenomenal has a great weight to it, the steel feels fantastic to the touch, especially on wrist. Mine was directly from Amazon so I can't speak to the trustworthiness of other suppliers but never the less this model is great. I already have a Speedmaster Moon Watch, and Plant Ocean both of which are higher end so I was expecting this to be a little lower quality, but not at all it's phenomenally done.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: A very beautiful watch. I actually checked it out at the local store before purchasing it online. Do note buying it at the authorized retail store will bag you a 3 year warranty for co-axial models, which this one is, versus the 2 years when you buy here. However, I have an Omega for more than 15 years and it was only recently that it needed repairs.
customer_reviews.author: dlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Omega watch. Well worth the price as it will / should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ... had the watch for few weeks and it is amazing. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for few weeks and it is amazing. I love it. I bought it from amazon and I am glad I did. This is the watch of my dreams
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Best watch for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Owned my Omega Seamaster for 14 years and one of the most comfortable and reliable watches I own. I own Rolex's, Breitlings, Ebel's and many other high end watches but the Omega is the most comfortable. They make this in a Quartz but buy the automatic because it will only go up in value.
customer_reviews.author: Richtx

customer_reviews.title: Omega Work Horse
customer_reviews.text: I've worn mine for over 20 years. I've had it serviced twice through Omega and it still keeps great time. As a serious watch collector I can share that this is one of my favorite watches to wear daily. It proudly hangs on my wrist as a true quality work horse timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyfox

customer_reviews.title: BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK
customer_reviews.text: I had Seamaster for a while now, but it stopped working, changed the battery, it would not work, very disappointing, after paying few thousand for a watch. I wish I bought a Tag or Seiko
customer_reviews.author: Shlomo

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Just right timing everytime. I feel fulfilled wearing this watch, it’s just the right one. That’s all
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever
customer_reviews.text: Born this watch after one of Bonds movie in 1999. Best watch ever. Gave my Rolex Oyster Date to my son. Keep time down to the last second. It also glows in the dark - a big plus. Had one maintenance service at a cost of $300. Wears it everyday and it still looks new. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
